body:
Hello Mostapha,

in the release notes of Honeybee and Ladybug you talk only about the installation of Radiance and Daysim. What about EnergyPlus?

It has to be installed in C:\ as well? 

What version we have to install? 7.2 or every version is fine?



Thank you



Francesco

replies.body: Ok, we don't need yet EnergyPlus. I made confusion because I have seen in the example file 000_GettingStarted_With_Honeybee.gh the component Honeybee_Generate Standard CIE Sky is looking for the epw file in the WeatherData folder of EnergyPlus.
Hi Francesco. Correct! You don't need EP for this version. I will try to update to the latest version of EP before the release. -Mostapha
